He arrived and flew down. He could feel evil in the air. He knew 
inside he would find bots ready to give their sparks to the Inferno 
in a cycle. He sent out a message:

My name is Shadow Star. I wish to join you.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> He continues flying on. Bathing in the feel of evil. In a few 
> Megacycles he would arrive, and find sparks ready for the taking.
>

> > Sorry lunch ended and I had to go to class. No one ever told me 
if

(probably

the
